mapper.sql: t.zqid zqid, t.yaid yaid, t.zdbwid zdbwid, t.jzid jzid, t.zqbw zqbw, t.zqdj zqdj, t.qhyy qhyy, t.gyjzhzwxx gyjzhzwxx, t.zhcs zhcs, t.rswz rswz, t.qhbwgd qhbwgd, t.rsmj rsmj, t.zqms zqms, t.zqsdyj zqsdyj, t.cjrid cjrid, t.cjrmc cjrmc, TO_CHAR(t.cjsj,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') cjsj, t.xgrid xgrid, t.xgrmc xgrmc, TO_CHAR(t.xgsj,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') xgsj, t.delete_flag deleteFlag, t.datasource datasource, t.bz bz, t.jdh jdh, TO_CHAR(t.sjc,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') sjc, t.reserve1 reserve1, t.reserve2 reserve2, t.reserve3 reserve3, TO_CHAR(t.reserve4,'yyyy-MM-dd HH24:mi:ss') reserve4
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(0) AS NUM FROM YAGL_YA_ZQSD t WHERE 1=1 AND DELETE_FLAG = 'N'

SELECT
FROM YAGL_YA_ZQSD t WHERE t.DELETE_FLAG = 'N'
mapper.insert:
SELECT SYS_GUID() AS zqid FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO YAGL_YA_ZQSD(zqid,yaid,zdbwid,jzid,zqbw,zqdj,qhyy,gyjzhzwxx,zhcs,rswz,qhbwgd,rsmj,zqms,zqsdyj,cjrid,cjrmc,cjsj,xgrid,xgrmc,xgsj,delete_flag,datasource,bz,jdh,sjc,reserve1,reserve2,reserve3,reserve4) VALUES(#{zqid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{yaid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{zdbwid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{jzid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{zqbw,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{zqdj,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{qhyy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{gyjzhzwxx,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{zhcs,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{rswz,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{qhbwgd,jdbcType=DOUBLE},#{rsmj,jdbcType=DOUBLE},#{zqms,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{zqsdyj,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{cjrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{cjrmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{cjsj,jdbcType=DATE},#{xgrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{xgrmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{xgsj,jdbcType=DATE},'N',#{datasource,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{bz,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{jdh,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{sjc,jdbcType=DATE},#{reserve1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{reserve2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{reserve3,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{reserve4,jdbcType=DATE})
mapper.update: UPDATE YAGL_YA_ZQSD t SET t.DELETE_FLAG = 'Y' WHERE 1=1 AND t.PKID = #{value}

INSERT INTO YAGL_YA_ZQSD(zqid,yaid,zdbwid,jzid,zqbw,zqdj,qhyy,gyjzhzwxx,zhcs,rswz,qhbwgd,rsmj,zqms,zqsdyj,cjrid,cjrmc,cjsj,xgrid,xgrmc,xgsj,delete_flag,datasource,bz,jdh,sjc,reserve1,reserve2,reserve3,reserve4) VALUES
#{item.zqid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} zqid,#{item.yaid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} yaid,#{item.zdbwid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} zdbwid,#{item.jzid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} jzid,#{item.zqbw,jdbcType=VARCHAR} zqbw,#{item.zqdj,jdbcType=VARCHAR} zqdj,#{item.qhyy,jdbcType=VARCHAR} qhyy,#{item.gyjzhzwxx,jdbcType=VARCHAR} gyjzhzwxx,#{item.zhcs,jdbcType=VARCHAR} zhcs,#{item.rswz,jdbcType=VARCHAR} rswz,#{item.qhbwgd,jdbcType=DOUBLE} qhbwgd,#{item.rsmj,jdbcType=DOUBLE} rsmj,#{item.zqms,jdbcType=VARCHAR} zqms,#{item.zqsdyj,jdbcType=VARCHAR} zqsdyj,#{item.cjrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} cjrid,#{item.cjrmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR} cjrmc,#{item.cjsj,jdbcType=DATE} cjsj,#{item.xgrid,jdbcType=VARCHAR} xgrid,#{item.xgrmc,jdbcType=VARCHAR} xgrmc,#{item.xgsj,jdbcType=DATE} xgsj,'N' delete_flag,#{item.datasource,jdbcType=VARCHAR} datasource,#{item.bz,jdbcType=VARCHAR} bz,#{item.jdh,jdbcType=VARCHAR} jdh,#{item.sjc,jdbcType=DATE} sjc,#{item.reserve1,jdbcType=VARCHAR} reserve1,#{item.reserve2,jdbcType=VARCHAR} reserve2,#{item.reserve3,jdbcType=VARCHAR} reserve3,#{item.reserve4,jdbcType=DATE} reserve4
ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE zqid = VALUES(zqid), yaid = VALUES(yaid), zdbwid = VALUES(zdbwid), jzid = VALUES(jzid), zqbw = VALUES(zqbw), zqdj = VALUES(zqdj), qhyy = VALUES(qhyy), gyjzhzwxx = VALUES(gyjzhzwxx), zhcs = VALUES(zhcs), rswz = VALUES(rswz), qhbwgd = VALUES(qhbwgd), rsmj = VALUES(rsmj), zqms = VALUES(zqms), zqsdyj = VALUES(zqsdyj), cjrid = VALUES(cjrid), cjrmc = VALUES(cjrmc), cjsj = VALUES(cjsj), xgrid = VALUES(xgrid), xgrmc = VALUES(xgrmc), xgsj = VALUES(xgsj), delete_flag = VALUES(delete_flag), datasource = VALUES(datasource), bz = VALUES(bz), jdh = VALUES(jdh), sjc = VALUES(sjc), reserve1 = VALUES(reserve1), reserve2 = VALUES(reserve2), reserve3 = VALUES(reserve3), reserve4 = VALUES(reserve4)
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM YAGL_YA_ZQSD t WHERE t.DELETE_FLAG = 'N'

SELECT , c2.CODE_NAME zqdjmc, c4.CODE_NAME rswzmc, c6.CODE_NAME zhcsmc, c8.CODE_NAME qhyymc, c10.CODE_NAME hzwxxmc FROM YAGL_YA_ZQSD t
Left Join SYS_CODELIST c1 on c1.CODETYPE = 'ZQDJ' And c1.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' Left Join SYS_CODELIST_DETAIL c2 On c1.CODEID = c2.CODEID And c2.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' and t.ZQDJ = c2.CODE_VALUE
Left Join SYS_CODELIST c3 on c3.CODETYPE = 'RSWZ' And c3.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' Left Join SYS_CODELIST_DETAIL c4 On c3.CODEID = c4.CODEID And c4.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' and t.RSWZ = c4.CODE_VALUE
Left Join SYS_CODELIST c5 on c5.CODETYPE = 'ZHCS' And c5.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' Left Join SYS_CODELIST_DETAIL c6 On c5.CODEID = c6.CODEID And c6.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' and t.ZHCS = c6.CODE_VALUE
Left Join SYS_CODELIST c7 on c7.CODETYPE = 'QHYY' And c7.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' Left Join SYS_CODELIST_DETAIL c8 On c7.CODEID = c8.CODEID And c8.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' and t.QHYY = c8.CODE_VALUE
Left Join SYS_CODELIST c9 on c9.CODETYPE = 'HZWXX' And c9.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' Left Join SYS_CODELIST_DETAIL c10 On c9.CODEID = c10.CODEID And c10.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' and t.GYJZHZWXX = c10.CODE_VALUE WHERE t.DELETE_FLAG = 'N' AND t.YAID = #{value}
